title: President Donald J. Trump’s Foreign Policy Puts America First – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
January 30, 2018
As we rebuild America’s strength and confidence at home, we are also restoring our strength and standing abroad.
						President Donald J. Trump					CHARTING A NEW COURSE: President Donald J. Trump’s foreign policy is putting the interests and security of the American people first.COMBATTING TERRORISM: Under President Trump’s leadership, the United States is defeating the terrorists who threaten our homeland and citizens.SECURING THE HOMELAND: President Trump is securing our borders and eliminating violence from our neighborhoods.REASSURING ALLIES AND DETERRING ENEMIES: The President is restoring critical alliances and working with allies and partners to confront our enemies.
